text: Nguyễn Thị Tuyết Dung (born 13 December 1993) is a Vietnamese footballer who plays as a midfielder. She won the Vietnamese Golden Ball award for women's soccer player in 2014. In a 2015 match against Malaysia, Dung scored two goals directly from corners. The first goal was scored with her left foot, and the second with her right foot. In 2017, Dung was named on the BBC 100 Women list. Dung was the first Vietnamese athlete on the BBC 100 Women list. ==International goals== {| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" ! # !! Date !!
